backend/main.mo: Defines actor with task, cooking assignment, calendar, recurring chore, and profile types plus CRUD logic secured by access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth flow and rendering tabs for tasks, dinner rota, calendar, and people.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks with fields for name, description, due date, and assignee, using React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Daily planner showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a selected date with editing and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Top-level calendar view supporting month, week, and day modes with task, assignment, and chore aggregation.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Weekly planner displaying tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores across a week with editing options.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Interface for viewing, assigning, and editing weekly cooking assignments with fairness statistics.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Modal dialog for editing a taskâ€™s name, description, assignee, and due date.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, identity controls, sample data action, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Renders a lightweight monthly calendar showing tasks, cooking assignments, and optional recurring chores with navigation controls. Builds per-day lookup maps and highlights selected dates and indicators.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a login screen with branding, an image, and a button to sign in using Internet Identity. Handles login state and shows loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of person profiles with names, colors, and principals. Provides dialogs, validation, and integration with profile queries.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Renders a badge showing a person's label with an optional colored dot. Supports size and variant customization.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Provides a selector for choosing a profile or manually entering a principal ID, with an option to auto-fill the current user's principal. Supports switching between select and manual modes.
frontend/src/components/PopulateSampleDa: Button that seeds sample data into tasks, chores, assignments, and profiles, with confirmation if data already exists. Shows loading states and mutation progress.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Dialog for creating, editing, pausing, and deleting recurring chores with fields for frequency, weekday, assignee, and validation. Syncs with backend chore queries and resets state on close.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Displays a collapsible preview of recurring chores grouped by weekday and provides a button to manage them.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Shows household tasks with grouping, editing, completion toggling, and integrates the recurring chores section.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Highlights tasks due today and today's cooking assignment, with loading states and simple task display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Fetches, updates, and deletes person profiles through the actor with react-query and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks and cooking-related data using an actor backend, with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Mutation hook that seeds demo user data by ensuring a profile exists, adding sample tasks, toggling one complete, and creating recurring chores.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: React hook that syncs state with sessionStorage, supporting JSON serialization and functional updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Helpers for safely encoding optional Candid values, returning undefined to represent empty optionals.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Utility functions for formatting cooking assignment labels, colors, and principal display strings.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Structured logging utilities for tracking deployment steps with success, failure, and guidance messaging.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes fairness statistics over cooking assignments for various date ranges, producing counts, colors, and summary data.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Helpers to resolve a principal to a label or color using person profiles, with fallbacks to shortened principals.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Utilities for safely parsing and validating principal strings without throwing, returning structured results.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logging helpers that output structured diagnostics for recurring chore mutations and errors.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes backend errors for recurring chore operations into user messages and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Functions to label timelines and group or sort recurring chores by weekday for preview displays.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines if recurring chores appear on a given date based on frequency and filters chores accordingly.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts dates and due dates into normalized day keys in yyyy-MM-dd format.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized day keys, sorts them, and adds a no-due-date group.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended theme utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Structured snapshot of the project's feature set, including authentication, RBAC, people profiles, and chore/task functionality, used as a machine-readable record of system capabilities.
